title: {websiteName} Access and Use Policies
subtitle: Guidelines for accessing and utilizing our open-source research platform

sections.title: Account Registration
sections.content: To access {websiteName}, users must register with a valid email and complete a verification process. This ensures secure access to our browser-based database for managing archaeological and historical data.

sections.title: Open Access
sections.content: {websiteName} is an open-source platform, offering free access to research tools and datasets. Premium features, like advanced analytics, may require a subscription.

sections.title: Data Submission
sections.content: Researchers can submit data via secure portals. All submissions are reviewed for CIDOC-CRM compliance and integrated into {websiteName}'s database.

sections.title: Data Usage
sections.content: Users may use {websiteName} data for research and education, provided they adhere to FAIR principles and cite the platform appropriately.

sections.title: Content Sharing
sections.content: Data shared on {websiteName} is licensed under open terms. Users must respect licensing agreements when reusing or redistributing content.

sections.title: Community Guidelines
sections.content: Users must follow {websiteName}'s guidelines, ensuring respectful collaboration and compliance with ethical standards in data handling.
